text: 1993 FIFA U-17 World Championship was held in Japan from 21 August to 4 September. ==Venues== Tokyo Hiroshima Kobe Tokyo National Stadium Hiroshima Big Arch Kobe Universiade Memorial Stadium Capacity: 48,000 Capacity: 50,000 Capacity: 35,910 Gifu City Kyoto Nagoya Gifu Nagaragawa Stadium Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium Paloma Mizuho Rugby Stadium Capacity: 26,109 Capacity: 20,588 Capacity: 15,000 ==Qualified Teams== Confederation Qualifying Tournament Qualifier(s) AFC (Asia) Host nation AFC (Asia) 1992 AFC U-17 Championship CAF (Africa) 1993 African U-17 Qualifying for World Cup CONCACAF (North, Central America & Caribbean) 1992 CONCACAF U-17 Tournament CONMEBOL (South America) 1993 South American U-17 Football Championship OFC (Oceania) 1993 OFC U-17 Championship UEFA (Europe) 1993 UEFA U-16 Championship ==Results== RSSSF ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 9 1 +8 9 align=left 3 1 1 1 2 2 0 4 align=left 3 1 0 2 4 7 -3 3 align=left 3 0 1 2 1 6 -5 1 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 14 0 +14 9 align=left 3 1 1 1 7 4 +3 4 align=left 3 1 1 1 7 6 +1 4 align=left 3 0 0 3 0 18 -18 0 ====Group C==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 7 3 +4 7 align=left 3 1 1 1 8 5 +3 4 align=left 3 1 0 2 3 6 -3 3 align=left 3 1 0 2 3 7 -4 3 ====Group D==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 8 4 +4 7 align=left 3 1 2 0 7 5 +2 5 align=left 3 1 0 2 2 5 -3 3 align=left 3 0 1 2 2 5 -3 1 {{Round8-with third |29 August – Kyoto||4||1 |29 August – Kobe||1||0 |29 August – Gifu||2||1 |29 August – Hiroshima||3||0 |1 September – Tokyo||3||0 |1 September – Hiroshima||2||1 |4 September – Tokyo||2||1 |4 September – Tokyo||1 (4)||1 (2) }} ==References== Category:FIFA U-17 World Cup Category:1993 in association football Category:1990s in Japan Category:Football in Japan Category:1993 in Asia
